TemplateContent.Subject: Hey {{name}}, ready to get your personal handyman?
TemplateContent.Html:
Hi {{name}}, it''s Taras from Mr. Fixter ??

Just wanted to remind you that your 7-day free trial is still waiting. With Fixter, you get unlimited visits - trip charge and labor included in your subscription!

We cover all Suffolk and Nassau County homes. Use code FIX10 to save 10% on your first month.

Start Free Trial

- Taras from Mr. Fixter
TemplateContent.Text: Hi {{name}}, it''s Taras from Mr. Fixter! Your 7-day free trial is still open. Unlimited handyman visits - trip charge and labor included. Use FIX10 for 10% off at profixter.com/register
